reasoning.zone_a_rationale: Contains the core product specifications exactly as required: Brand (Shalimar), Product Type (Garbage Bags), Size (Medium), Dimension (19 X 21 Inches), Pack String (120 Bags (30 Bags x 4 Rolls)), and Color (Black). All LOCKED FACTS are used once.
reasoning.zone_b_rationale: Integrates the top keyword 'garbage bags medium size' and the key feature 'Perforated Box for Easy Dispensing' from the original title. It avoids repeating specs from Zone A by using the keyword phrase without the standalone 'Medium' or count.
reasoning.zone_c_rationale: Focuses on the scent descriptor, combining the exact fragrance name 'Lavender Fragrance' with the scented product type 'Scented Trash Bags' to capture relevant search terms.
